DOC.brief_summary: This study extension study CQTI571A2102 evaluate long-term safety , tolerability efficacy QTI571 ( imatinib ) severe pulmonary arterial hypertension patient .
DOC.brief_title: Extension CQTI571A2102 Evaluate Long-term Safety , Tolerability Efficacy Imatinib Severe Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension ( PAH )
DOC.criteria: Patients complete CQTI571A2102 clinical trial include Study Completion assessment end study visit meet eligibility criterion study meet withdrawal criterion safety reason study conduct Patients leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 45 % Patients thrombocytopenia , platelet count < 50 x109/L ( 50 x 103/ÂµL ) . Patients uncontrolled systemic arterial hypertension , systolic pressure > 160 mmHg diastolic pressure > 90 mmHg . Patients QTcF > 450 m male > 470 m female absence right bundle branch block . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
